name: Pizza time!
description:
Take control of Boolivia, a ghost whose been hired as a pizza delivery girl and deliver pizza to undead patrons.

For those who want to know this is a simple prototype I made on my spare time. As such, you may encounter bugs here and there. I want to improve myself as a developer so criticism and suggestions are accepted.


To Install:

Linux: Download the .Appimage and .Pck Files

Windows: Download and run the.exe file

Mac OS: Extract and Run
